creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: red and yellow fibers woven around circular band; six brush-like red elements; two tassel-like ornaments-one slightly larger than the other-front and back- with red and black hair
dimension: 2 7/16 x 9 3/4 x 9 1/2 in. (6.19 x 24.77 x 24.13 cm) (including "tassels")
title: Woman's head band
